LanguageData.Rawsnowbeet.label: snow beet
LanguageData.Raweggplant.label: eggplant
LanguageData.Raweggplant.description: Purple variety of the eggplant. Bitten when eaten raw.
LanguageData.Rawpumpkin.label: pumpkin
LanguageData.Rawpumpkin.description: Large orange version of the squash plant. Often carved to ward off ghosts.
LanguageData.Rawsquash.label: squash
LanguageData.Rawsquash.description: Yellow variety of the squash family.
LanguageData.Rawbean.label: bean
LanguageData.Rawbean.description: Common bean cooked up in many ways.
LanguageData.RawTomatoes.label: tomatoes
LanguageData.RawTomatoes.description: A sharp-tasting fruit that has many uses.
LanguageData.RawOlive.label: Olive
LanguageData.RawOlive.description: A small berry fruit that grows on trees.
LanguageData.RawCarrots.label: carrots
LanguageData.RawCarrots.description: Crunchy vegetable with a refreshing taste. May help you see in the dark.
LanguageData.Rawmushroom.label: mushroom
LanguageData.Rawmushroom.description: Raw protein-rich mushrooms. Nice to eat, even when raw.
LanguageData.Rawoats.label: oats
LanguageData.Rawoats.description: Cereal grain used for livestock feed or cooked for food.
LanguageData.PickledVeg.label: Pickled Vegetable
LanguageData.PickledVeg.description: Vegetables that have been preserved in a salty brine.
